TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_1_DESC: Quickly create a new topic for idea gathering, pro-con discussion or voting, or set up a new group.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_2_DESC: The main menu serves as your main navigation through the platform. There are quick links to all your topics based on their current phase, i.e. idea gathering, discussion, voting or action phase, as well as to any groups you're a member of.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_2_DESC2: You can also access your profile, change the language, or go to the Help Centre.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_3_DESC: Find all your new activity here – new ideas, arguments, voting updates, action posts and more. You can open and close the activity feed whenever you want.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_3_DESC2: Pokud od poslední návštěvy došlo k nové aktivitě, bude kanál aktivit ve výchozím nastavení otevřen.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_4_DESC: Hledáte téma nebo skupinu? Hledejte ho zde.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_4_DESC2: Hledání je si vědomo toho, zda se nacházíte v nějakém tématu, či nikoliv. Pokud ne, bude vyhledávat po celé platformě.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_4_DESC3: Pokud jste v tématu, bude hledat pouze v tomto tématu.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_5_DESC: Any topics you’re part of will show up on your dashboard, as well as popular public topics you may wish to join.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_5_DESC2: Jakmile se zúčastníte nebo vytvoříte témata, zobrazí se zde.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_6_DESC: Groups are a space in which people with something in common can access relevant topics. For example, members could be part of the same organisation or community. Or have similar interests or goals.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_6_DESC2: Groups allow a set of topics to be shared quickly and easily - either to invited members, or via a public URL or QR code. New topics can be added at any time, to which members get instant access.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_MOBILE_STEP_2_LBL_DASHBOARD_DE: This is your central hub and portal to all parts of the platform - create, browse, engage, and more.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_MOBILE_STEP_2_LBL_MY_TOPICS_DE: Zde můžete najít témata, která jste vytvořili nebo jste do nich zapojeni.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_MOBILE_STEP_2_LBL_MY_GROUPS_DE: Zde najdete skupiny, které jste založil, nebo jste členem.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_MOBILE_STEP_2_LBL_ACTIVITY_FEE: Zde se zobrazí nová aktivita ve vašich tématech a skupinách.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_MOBILE_STEP_3_DESC: Horní menu je vždy dostupné pro navigaci a téma nebo vytváření skupiny. Rychle najdete stránky jako nástěnka, Moje témata, Moje skupiny, veřejné témata a veřejné skupiny.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_TABLET_STEP_2_LBL_PUBLIC_TOPIC: Here you can find all the public topics that have been created on our platform.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_TABLET_STEP_2_LBL_PUBLIC_GROUP: Here you can find all the public groups that have been created on our platform.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC: A topic can have different phases.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC_DISCUSSION: In a discussion phase, the main idea is to have a constructive dialogue using pro and con arguments.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC_IDEATION: In this phase, anyone can share their ideas on how to tackle the issue at hand, and feed back on the ideas of others.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC_VOTE: When there’s a need for a clear representation of where participants lean, you can hold a vote.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC_FOLLOW_UP: After a decision has been made, the action phase offers a way to keep participants up-to-date with the next steps.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC: In each topic you can perform specific actions.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC_SEARCH: Najděte cokoliv v rámci samotného tématu a rychle na toto klíčové slovo přeskočte.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC_ACTIVITY_FEED: Check out what happened while you were away with the topic's activity feed.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC_FAVOURITE: Add or remove this topic to or from your favourites.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC_MORE: Here, topic admins and editors can edit the content and settings, invite co-creators or close a topic.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_3_DESC: Zde jsou všechny příslušné informace o tématu, které byste mohli potřebovat. Je to veřejné nebo soukromé? Kdo je publikoval a kdy?
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_3_DESC2: Here you can see the social media hashtag used. Clicking on it reveals the social media mentions.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_3_DESC3: You can also view any attachments, check which groups are invited, and see which categories the topic is tagged in.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_4_DESC: Here you can see how many participants are in this topic. Admins can also manage participants permissions, and invite more people.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_5_DESC: A topic can consist of several phases. Here, participants can see an overview of each phase’s status, and admins can add another phase.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_6_DESC: The topic text is the basis for the idea gathering and/or discussion and voting. The main background information will be shared here.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_6_DESC2: By default, we will keep this collapsed, but you can expand it at any time to read the entire text.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_7_DESC: The main discussion will take place here. Anyone can post a pro or con argument, or provide some additional information.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_7_DESC_DISCUSSION: When the topic is in a 'discussion' phase, this is where anyone can post pro or con arguments, provide additional information, and reply to or like each other's arguments.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_7_DESC_IDEATION: When the topic is in an 'ideas' phase, this is where participants can add ideas, and reply to or like each other's ideas.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_7_DESC_VOTE: When the topic is in a 'voting' phase, this is where participants can cast their votes and see the results once it's ended.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_7_DESC_FOLLOW_UP: When the topic is in an 'action' phase, this is where topic admins can post updates about actions taken as a result of the decision.
TOUR.TOPIC_MOBILE_STEP_1_DESC: A topic can hold a lot of information. Since this is a small screen, we've organised it to have better focus.
TOUR.TOPIC_MOBILE_STEP_1_DESC_DOCUMENT: The topic’s text and info are accessible from here.
TOUR.TOPIC_MOBILE_STEP_1_DESC_DISCUSSION: This is where the discussion takes place, using pro and con arguments.
TOUR.TOPIC_MOBILE_STEP_1_DESC_VOTE: When there’s a need for a clear representation of where participants lean, you can hold a vote.
TOUR.TOPIC_MOBILE_STEP_1_DESC_FOLLOW_UP: After a decision has been made, the action phase offers a way to keep participants up-to-date with the next steps.

TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.VOTE_QUESTION_HEADING: Please add a specific question for the participants to vote on.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.SELECT_VOTING_SYSTEM_DESC: Hlasovací systém definuje, z jakých možností si účastníci budou moci vybrat.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.OPTION_VOTING_IDEATION_DESC: Participants can vote for their preferred idea(s) from the idea gathering. In the next step, you'll choose which ideas to include in the vote.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.OPTION_VOTING_REGULAR_DESC: Participants can choose from a simple yes, no or neutral
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.OPTION_VOTING_MULTIPLE_DESC: Participants can choose from custom options you set
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.LBL_CAN_ADD_EXTRA_OPTIONS: You can also add neutral and veto options.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.LBL_SET_UP_VOTING_RIGHTS_DESC: Choose how participants must cast their votes. For both options, only the topic admin(s) can see how people voted, once the vote has ended.

MODALS.TOPIC_EDIT_DISABLED_DESCRIPTION: This topic text has been locked and is no longer editable
MODALS.TOPIC_EDIT_DISABLED_WHY_DESCRIPTION: When a voting or action phase gets started, the topic text serves as the single source of truth. By locking it, we can ensure there's full transparency for participants to know what they're voting on or what decisions need to be acted on.

HOME.FEATURE_VOTING_FOOTER_INFO: After collecting votes you can move the topic into action.

HOME.FEATURE_GROUP_DESC_ITEM_1: Invite people with a common interest to a group, to give them easy access to relevant topics
HOME.FEATURE_GROUP_DESC_ITEM_2: Quickly share your group space of related topics via a public link
HOME.FEATURE_GROUP_DESC_ITEM_3: Join a public or private group that deals with topics that interest you
HOME.HEADING_WELCOME: Hi there, welcome to Citizen OS!
HOME.PUBLIC_GROUPS_DESCRIPTION: Have a sneak peek at some of the most recent public groups available on Citizen OS.

HOME.MISSION_BOX_DESC: To empower as many people as possible to participate in respectful, meaningful discussions. We aim to facilitate collective decisions on issues that directly affect people’s wellbeing.

HOME.TXT_KEEP_IT_CLEAN_PLAN: Keep It Clean Plan by Let's Do It! World.
HOME.TXT_DESCRIPTION_KEEP_IT_CLEAN_PLAN: Here you can find all the documents and information on the Keep It Clean Plan.
HOME.TXT_DESCRIPTION_HACKTIVIST_COMMUNITY: Občanská hacktivistická komunita je prostor pro setkání lidí, kteří zastupují e-demokracii a spolurozhodování.

HOME.TXT_CITIZENOS_COMMUNITY_DESCRIPTION: Připojte se k nám v diskusích o vývoji platformy a elektronické demokracii.

GROUP.LBL_NO_RULES: There are no group rules of conduct
GROUP.HAVENT_ENGAGED_TOPICS_HEADING: This group doesn't have any topics yet
GROUP.HAVENT_ENGAGED_TOPICS_DESCRIPTION: Topics are spaces for people to engage in idea gathering, discussions and voting. Group admins can add topics, so that members can share their thoughts.
GROUP.NAME: @:COMPONENTS.GROUP_INVITE.NAME
GROUP.TOOLTIP_MEMBERS_PERMISSIONS_DESCRIPTION: Admins can access all settings to manage the group. Members can access the topics to which the group has been invited, with whatever rights they have been assigned for each topic. In public groups, members can also invite and share the group.

GROUP_CREATE.HEADING: Create a group
GROUP_CREATE.INFO_SETTINGS_INPUT_NAME_DESC: Use a name that’s understandable and logical.
GROUP_CREATE.INFO_SETTINGS_CHOOSE_IMAGE_DESC: Upload an image that represents your group well.
GROUP_CREATE.INFO_SETTINGS_LBL_DROP_IMAGE: Drop the image here or click the button
GROUP_CREATE.INFO_SETTINGS_INPUT_CONTACT_EMAIL_DESC: This email will be visible to members – and everyone if it’s a public group.
GROUP_CREATE.INFO_SETTINGS_RULES_OF_CONDUCT_DESC: Add rules of conduct, to avoid any bad experiences. E.g. use a certain language, or no hatespeech.
GROUP_CREATE.SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_DESC: Set whether your group is visible to anyone, or only by invitation.
GROUP_CREATE.SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_PRIVATE_DESC: Only people with invites can join
GROUP_CREATE.SETTINGS_CATEGORY_SELECT_DESC: Choose up to 3 categories that fit your topic.
GROUP_CREATE.SETTINGS_LOCALITY_SELECT_DESC: You can assign a country and language to this group, to make it easier for local people to find.
GROUP_CREATE.HELP_DESCRIPTION: Creating a group is a great way to give people a sense of belonging to a community, and makes them more likely to engage.
GROUP_CREATE.NOTIFICATION_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Congratulations! Keep in mind you can always manage the group via the group actions menu.

IDEATION_CREATE.HEADING: Create a topic starting with idea gathering
IDEATION_CREATE.SETTINGS_HEADING_IDEATION_QUESTION_DESC: Please add a specific idea gathering question to bring focus for the participants.
IDEATION_CREATE.SETTINGS_HEADING_IDEATION_DEADLINE_DESC: You can opt to include a deadline, which will close the idea gathering automatically when reached. You can always edit the deadline, or manually close the idea gathering at any time.
IDEATION_CREATE.SETTINGS_HEADING_ADVANCED_SETTINGS_DESC: Further options to customise the idea gathering phase.
IDEATION_CREATE.LBL_CREATE_ITEA_TEMPLATE_DESC: You can create a template to give participants guidance how to compose their idea.
IDEATION_CREATE.LBL_ALLOW_ANONYMOUS_DESC: Ideas are posted without showing the poster’s name
IDEATION_CREATE.DEMOGRAPHICS_DATA_DESCRIPTION: Fields will be mandatory. Requested fields cannot be changed once idea gathering starts.
IDEATION_CREATE.PREVIEW_INFO: This is a preview of your topic! You can still edit your topic at any point prior to starting a vote.
IDEATION_CREATE.NO_IDEAS_DESC_BEFORE: By adding an idea gathering phase to your topic, you incentivise your participants to share ideas. Ideas can be replied to and 'liked', and the top ideas will show up higher.
IDEATION_CREATE.NO_IDEAS_DESC_AFTER: Afterwards you can take the best idea(s) and put them to the vote to reach a final conclusion.
IDEATION_CREATE.HELP_DESCRIPTION: Starting your topic with idea gathering allows you to gather ideas, before moving on to a pro-con discussion and/or vote and action phase.
IDEATION_CREATE.HELP_ITEM_ADD_VOTING: Add voting to choose from ideas or vote on a question
IDEATION_CREATE.SUCCESS_IDEATION_STARTED: Idea gathering has successfully been started

MY.HEADING_AT_LEAST_WE_HELP: A nakonec máte nás, kteří vám pomohou
MY.HEADING_NOT_PARTICIPATED: Zatím jste se tématu neúčastnili. Zkuste to, je to opravdu skvělé!

PASSWORD_FORGOT.PASSWORD_FORGOT_DESCRIPTION: No worries! We can send you a reset link so you can get a new password.

PUBLIC_GROUP.HEADING_DESCRIPTION: Zdá se, že do této skupiny zatím nepatří žádná témata.

REGISTER.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION: Wondering what the catch is? There isn't one! We're a non-profit with a mission to empower as many people as possible to participate in respectful, meaningful discussions on the issues that matter to them. We run off donations and grants from long-term funders – which means no fees, no sale of your data, no strings attached!
REGISTER.TOOLTIP_LNK_ABOUT: Read more on our About page

TOPIC_CREATE.HEADING: Create a topic starting with discussion
TOPIC_CREATE.TOOLTIP_ADD_TO_GROUP_CONTENT: In a private group, anyone can add topics. In a public group, only admins can add topics, but anyone can 'Request to add topics' via the button on the group's page.
TOPIC_CREATE.TOOLTIP_TOPIC_INTRO_CONTENT: The intro to your topic will make it easier for participants to get a quick sense of what they'll get involved with.
TOPIC_CREATE.TITLE_INTRO_TEXT: Add a brief introduction or call to action, summarising what the topic is for.
TOPIC_CREATE.TOOLTIP_TOPIC_TEXT_CONTENT: The main topic content goes here. Add any instructions, information or context that participants may need to engage in the topic.
TOPIC_CREATE.TOOLTIP_ATTACHMENTS_DESCRIPTION_LIMIT: A maximum of {{limit}} files can be attached to one topic.
TOPIC_CREATE.SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_DESC: Set whether your topic is visible to anyone, or only by invitation.
TOPIC_CREATE.TOOLTIP_TOPIC_LOCALITY_CONTENT: This gives an indication of the working language of the topic (i.e. the topic text, participant contributions, etc.). The platform language can be set separately by each individual user.
TOPIC_CREATE.SETTINGS_LOCALITY_SELECT_DESC: You can assign a country and language to this topic, to make it easier for local people to find.
TOPIC_CREATE.SETTINGS_ADD_TO_GROUP_DESC: You can add this topic to a group you're part of, either now or later. All topics in a group are shared with its members, and can be shared via the group's public link too. To add topics to a group, you'll need to have the correct rights
TOPIC_CREATE.SETTINGS_GROUP_SELECT_ALL_ADDED: All groups you have admin rights for have already been added
TOPIC_CREATE.NO_GROUPS_HEADING: No groups to add to yet
TOPIC_CREATE.NO_GROUPS_DESCRIPTION: Once you're part of a group and have the correct rights, you can add this topic to it here. Don’t worry, you can skip this now and still do it later
TOPIC_CREATE.SETTINGS_HEADING_GROUP_LIST: Groups you're adding this topic to:
TOPIC_CREATE.TOOLTIP_GROUP_PERMISSIONS_CONTENT: This will give all members of the group the selected role within the topic, unless you individually assign them a different role from the topic's 'manage participants' section.
TOPIC_CREATE.TOOLTIP_GROUP_PERMISSIONS_CONTENT_PERMIS: Admins can access all settings to manage the topic. Editors can edit the topic content (text, images, attachments) and the tags (categories, language, location). Participants can participate in whichever topic phase is open.
TOPIC_CREATE.SETTINGS_HEADING_DISCUSSION_QUESTION_DES: Please add a specific discussion question to bring focus for the participants. You can only post one discussion question per topic. Participants can respond with pro, con or informational arguments.
TOPIC_CREATE.SETTINGS_HEADING_DISCUSSION_DEADLINE_DES: You can opt to include a deadline, which will close the discussion automatically when reached. You can always edit the deadline, or manually close the discussion at any time.
TOPIC_CREATE.PREVIEW_INFO: This is a preview of your topic! You can still edit your topic at any point during the discussion phase.
TOPIC_CREATE.WRITE_TOGETHER_DESC: Collaborate on the topic text by inviting co-creators.
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_DESCRIPTION: Starting your topic with a discussion phase allows participants to share pro & con arguments, before moving on to a vote or action phase. Want to gather ideas? Start with an idea gathering phase instead.
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_NEXT_DESCRIPTION: What can you do when the topic is published?
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_ITEM_ADD_IDEATION: Add idea gathering to start collecting ideas
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_ITEM_ADD_VOTING: Add voting to start collecting votes
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_ITEM_ADD_FOLLOW_UP: Add an action phase to keep participants up to date on any progress made.
TOPIC_CREATE.NOTIFICATION_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Congratulations on your new topic! Now it’s time to get people engaged. Invite participants below or you can also invite them later.
TOPIC_CREATE.NOTIFICATION_DRAFT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Téma bylo uloženo do vašich konceptů.

TOPIC_EDIT.HEADING: Edit topic
TOPIC_EDIT.NOTIFICATION_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: You have successfully updated your topic!

TOPICS_TOPICID.TOOLTIP_FAVOURITE: Save topic to your personal favourites
TOPICS_TOPICID.TOOLTIP_TOPIC_SAVED_TO_FAVOURITE: Topic saved to your personal favourites
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TITLE_DRAW: Vypadá to, že váš hlasovací proces vyústil v remízu.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_DRAW_DESCRIPTION: Sometimes having several winning options is a good thing, but there are times when you really just need one clear winner.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TITLE_DRAW_WHAT_NOW: Zde je to, co byste mohli nyní udělat:
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TXT_DRAW_WHAT_NOW: It might be possible to solve this offline - for example, a co-located team could flip a coin between the two winning options. Also, if you had votes going to non-winning options, we suggest you run another vote between the two winning options only. This time, you could pre-determine a tie-breaker in case you have another draw: a coin flip, a default winning option (usually status quo wins in a draw), a person whose vote is decisive, etc.
TOPICS_TOPICID.DESCRIPTION_REPORTED: Since you’re a moderator of this topic, there are several actions you can take:
TOPICS_TOPICID.DESCRIPTION_REPORTED_ADMIN: Since you’re an admin/author of this topic, there are several actions you can take:
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_LNK_MODERATE: Hide this topic if you agree with why it was reported
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_LNK_RESOLVE: Mark as resolved if the topic (again) conforms to the Citizen OS Rules of Conduct
TOPICS_TOPICID.ADD_MILESTONES_PLACEHOLDER_SUBJECT: Jak se rozhodnutí uvádí do praxe?
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_HEADING_REQUIRE_HARD_ID: This vote requires an ID-card or Mobiil-ID signature.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_REQUIRE_HARD_ID: This vote needs to be signed with an ID-card or Mobiil-ID to be registered. You cannot vote without identifying yourself.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_REGISTERED: Thank you for your vote. You can still change your vote at any time before the voting closes.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_CLOSED: To download voting results, select a suitable format below. Our "human-readable" container comes with an additional spreadsheet file (.csv, comma-separated table) containing data for each individual vote, as required by Riigikogu and local governments. For systems that can't process such info (such as Äriregister) please select "machine-readable" file.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_CLOSED_EXPIRED: Votes have now been cast. Please send topic to action phase, then return here to download voting results.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_AUTH_SOFT_ID_EXPLANATION: Přihlášení do systému Citizen OS je vyžadováno
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_AUTH_HARD_ID_EXPLANATION: ID-Card, Mobiil-ID nebo Smart-ID podpis je vyžadován
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_DELEGATION_EXPLANATION: Povolit uživatelům předat své hlasovací právo.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_NOTICE_DELEGATION_DISABLED_FOR_: Pokud je eID zvolenou metodou hlasování, delegování není povoleno.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_HEADING_STEP4_DESCRIPTION: You can choose either a deadline or vote amount, or combine them. When you combine them, the first that is reached will end voting.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_VOTE_AMOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Define the end of the voting system based on the amount of votes counted. You can only choose one.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_MINIMUM_VOTES_DESCRIPTION: Počet hlasů potřebných pro úspěšné uzavření.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_ALL_VOTES_ARE_IN_EXPLANATION: When every user in the topic has voted, the voting system closes.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_SET_VOTE_REMINDER_EXPLANATION: You can set an automatic reminder email for users a few days before the end of the voting
TOPICS_TOPICID.TXT_YOU_CAN_CHOOSE_OPTIONS: This is a multiple selection voting. Please choose {{range}} options.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_DESCRIPTION_CHOICE_RANGE: Define the max amount of choices a person can vote for. For example, you have 4 choices but you allow people to choose up to 2 out of them. You can only add as many as you have choices to choose from.
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_HAS_BEEN_DELETED_BY: This contribution has been deleted by user {{usersFullName}}
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_HAS_BEEN_DELETED_BY_MODERATOR: This contribution has been deleted by user {{usersFullName}} (moderator)
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_FOUND_INAPPRIOPRIATE_BY: This contribution was found inappropriate by user {{usersFullName}}
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_CREATOR_REMOVED_ARGUMENT: This contribution was removed by its creator
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_READ_CODE_OF_CONDUCT: Přečtěte si náš kodex chování a získejte více informací
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_REPLY_FOUND_INAPPRIOPRIATE_BY: Tato odpověď byla uživatelem {{usersFullName}} shledána nevhodnou
TOPICS_TOPICID.COMMENT_TYPE_SELECT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION_P: Tuto možnost použijte, pokud souhlasíte a chcete opustit argument, který je podpůrný nebo ve prospěch tématu.
TOPICS_TOPICID.COMMENT_TYPE_SELECT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION_C: Tuto možnost použijte, pokud nesouhlasíte a chcete ponechat argument, který toto téma nepodporuje.
TOPICS_TOPICID.COMMENT_TYPE_SELECT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION_P: Tuto možnost použijte, pokud chcete učinit krátké prohlášení nebo pointu, položit otázku nebo vysvětlení tématu.
TOPICS_TOPICID.PLACEHOLDER_EXPLAIN_YOUR_ARGUMENT: Zde vysvětlete a potvrďte své prohlášení...
TOPICS_TOPICID.LOG_IN_TO_PARTICIPATE: You need to log in to participate.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_SOCIAL_METIONS_TXT_NO_HASHTAG_DEFINE: Sorry, we cannot show social mentions as there is no hashtag linked to this topic. Topic admins can add the hashtag to pull in social mentions.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_SOCIAL_MENTIONS_NO_MENTIONS_FOUND: Sorry, no social mentions found on X for the hashtag
TOPICS_TOPICID.TXT_QR_CODE_FOOTER_SCAN_CODE: Přejděte přímo na téma {{topicTitle}} přes naskenování tohoto QR kódu!
TOPICS_TOPICID.SECTION_INFO_NO_ATTACHMENTS: There are currently no attachments for this topic
TOPICS_TOPICID.SECTION_INFO_NO_GROUPS: There are currently no groups for this topic
TOPICS_TOPICID.SECTION_INFO_NO_CATEGORIES: There are currently no categories for this topic
TOPICS_TOPICID.SECTION_NOTIFICATIONS_DESC: Turn on all notifications to stay engaged and up to date with this topic's activity.
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_VOTING_HEADING: There is no voting phase yet
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_VOTING_DESC_BEFORE: When a voting phase is added to a topic, participants can share their views by casting a vote. The vote can be set up in different ways, depending on the needs of the topic.
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_VOTING_DESC_AFTER: After voting has finished, the results can be seen by everyone, and the decision taken forward. Only the topic admin(s) can see how people voted.
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_FOLLOW_UP_HEADING: There is no action phase yet
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_FOLLOW_DESC_BEFORE: Action is the last phase of a topic. After a decision has been made, topic admins can post plans and updates about what has and will happen as a result
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_FOLLOW_DESC_AFTER: This allows everyone to see the results of the decision, and follow its progress as it goes along.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TUTORIAL_DESC: New to the platform? Or first time since the redesign? We’d love to guide you through how topics work.

VOTE_CREATE.HEADING: Create a topic with voting options
VOTE_CREATE.PREVIEW_INFO: This is a preview of your topic! You can still edit your topic at any point prior to starting the vote.
VOTE_CREATE.HELP_DESCRIPTION: Starting your topic with a vote phase allows you to cut straight to the decision. If you'd like to gather ideas or discuss pros and cons before voting, start with an idea gathering or discussion phase, then add voting later
